title: Drawing, "The Wizard from the Wall, Gas Light and Coke Co.", October 21, 1935
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Running, abstract figure, dressed as Harlequin, wearing a chef’s hat and carrying a hand bell in one hand and a salver in the other; a light switch beside it. Above: I COOK; below: YOUR DINNER FOR Id / SAYS THE WIZARD FROM THE WALL / [lines for type blocked out] / MAKE ELECTRICITY THE SERVANT / IN YOUR HOME.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Wizard from the Wall, Gas Light and Coke Co.", October 21, 1935.
October 21, 1935. Graphite on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-650.
